name: Install Door
goal: Secure the entrance with a wooden door

steps.title: Craft Door
steps.details: Craft an oak_door. Requires 6 planks and a crafting table.

steps.title: Clear Doorway
steps.details: Clear 2 blocks vertically where the door will go to ensure it fits.

steps.title: Place Door
steps.details: Place the door. Use width=1, length=1, material='oak_door'.
